name: Birdy Tour
description:
Join our little friend on his tour through the forest!

This game will push you to the limit of your nerves. Can you beat a Score above 200, 500or even 1000?

A 2D arcade game where you need to avoid the trees and jump through the gaps. The further you get, the harder it gets, but don't think it will start easy! Try your Luck and beat our highscore of 200 Points! Make your own highscore and compete with your friends! Who'll get the higher highscore?

FEATURES:

-Skins (COMING SOON!).
Check out the skin shop where you unlock new skins for your Bird and the Enviroment. Customize your own styl. There are many new different Designs for you to choose from. This feature is coming soon!!!

There are more features, planned and we will constantly update the game!

- More Obstacles [Like Cannons and more]!

- Skins for Bird and Environment!

- Gamemode with Bosses!

...and more!
